title: Javascript
content: JavaScript is a scripting or programming language that allows you to implement complex features on web pages

title: SCSS
content: SCSS is a preprocessor scripting language that is compiled into CSS

title: ReactJS
content: The library for web and native user interfaces. React lets you build user interfaces out of individual pieces called components

title: Typescript
content: TypeScript is a strongly typed programming language that builds on JavaScript, giving you better tooling at any scale

title: Redux
content: A Predictable State Container for JS Apps. It helps you write applications that behave consistently, run in different environments, and are easy to test

title: Ag-grid
content: AG Grid is a fully-featured and highly customizable JavaScript data grid
